Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
TCS Autonomous Operations (TAO) is an agentic AI-enabled operations solution based on Microsoft Foundry for Infrastructure and Applications on Microsoft Azure. This solution integrates with ITSM tools and leverages the SOPs, incident logs, knowledge base articles, events store and code base to perform triage and resolution of operational issues. This solution includes a set of AI agents to enable 100% digital-first interactions, up to 25% reduction in incidents and up to 30% improvement in MTTR.
